title: UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH Exe:Late[st]
notes: had 1 sound related lockup in Arcade mode but couldn't reproduce it; videos in gallery only give black screen; Netplay has issues (but that seems to be unrelated to Linux), going by all the complaints from Windows users in the forum, the game seems to work as well/badly in Proton as on Windows.

title: UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH Exe:Late[st]
